name: DBAutomation-SQLServer-Utility
description: Utility for automating SQL Server based database upgrade activity.
helpMarkDown: This utility is for automating SQL Server based database upgrade activity.
author: mohdaslamansari

inputs.name: InputFolder
inputs.label: Script Folder Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the location of folder where all the SQL scripts are placed.

inputs.name: DBUserName
inputs.label: Database User Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the database user name. This user should have privileges to execute the scripts.

inputs.name: DBPwd
inputs.label: Database Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the database user's password.
The best practice is to create a variable in the Build or Release definition, and mark it as 'Secret' to secure it, and then use it here, like '$(dbPassword)'.

inputs.name: DBServerAndInstance
inputs.label: DBServer And Instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the database server and instance name.
